column1: The order is placed using Bambora Checkout, and is now awaiting payment.
column2: The order is placed using Bambora Checkout, and is now awaiting payment.

column1: Go to the Bambora administration to handle your transactions
column2: Go to the Bambora administration to handle your transactions

column1: An error occured. Please contact the shop owner
column2: An error occured. Please contact the shop owner

column1: You have chosen to pay for the order using Bambora Checkout.
column2: You have chosen to pay for the order using Bambora Checkout.

column1: The shop accepts the following payment types
column2: The shop accepts the following payment types

column2: Thank you for using Bambora Checkout

column1: To enable and disable this payment method.
column2: To enable and disable this payment method.

column1: The title of the payment method displayed to the customers.
column2: The title of the payment method displayed to the customers.

column1: The number identifying your Bambora merchant account. If you don't know your merchant number, please log into your Bambora account. Go to Settings -> Merchant numbers to view your merchant number."
column2: The number identifying your Bambora merchant account. If you don't know your merchant number, please log into your Bambora account. Go to Settings -> Merchant numbers to view your merchant number."

column1: The Access token for the API user received from the Bambora administration. If you don't know your Access token please log into your Bambora account. Go to Settings -> API users to view or create a new API user."
column2: The Access token for the API user received from the Bambora administration. If you don't know your Access token please log into your Bambora account. Go to Settings -> API users to view or create a new API user."

column1: The Secret token for the API user received from the Bambora administration. The Secret token is only displayed to you when you create a new API user and as such you should take note of it. If you have lost your Secret token, log into your Bambora account and create a new API user. Go to Settings -> API users -> Create API users"
column2: The Secret token for the API user received from the Bambora administration. The Secret token is only displayed to you when you create a new API user and as such you should take note of it. If you have lost your Secret token, log into your Bambora account and create a new API user. Go to Settings -> API users -> Create API users"

column1: The MD5 key is used to stamp data sent between Magento and Bambora to prevent it from being tampered with. The MD5 key is optional but if used here, must be the same as in the Bambora administration. To view your MD5 key please log into your Bambora account and go to Settings -> Merchant numbers -> Edit"
column2: The MD5 key is used to stamp data sent between Magento and Bambora to prevent it from being tampered with. The MD5 key is optional but if used here, must be the same as in the Bambora administration. To view your MD5 key please log into your Bambora account and go to Settings -> Merchant numbers -> Edit"

column1: The ID of the payment window to use. You can find the available payment windows in the Bambora administration. Please log into your Bambora account and go to Settings -> Payment windows."
column2: The ID of the payment window to use. You can find the available payment windows in the Bambora administration. Please log into your Bambora account and go to Settings -> Payment windows."

column1: Set to Yes if you wish to capture payments at the same time they are authorized. In some countries, this is only permitted if the consumer receives the products right away Ex. digital products.
column2: Set to Yes if you wish to capture payments at the same time they are authorized. In some countries, this is only permitted if the consumer receives the products right away Ex. digital products.

column1: Set to Overlay for the Payment Window to open as a overlayed window on top of the store. The store will be visible behind the payment window. Set to Full Screen to open the payment window in the same window but in full-screen. The store will not be visible in this setting.
column2: Set to Overlay for the Payment Window to open as a overlayed window on top of the store. The store will be visible behind the payment window. Set to Full Screen to open the payment window in the same window but in full-screen. The store will not be visible in this setting.

column1: Set to Yes to immediately redirect your customer back to you shop after the payment completed.
column2: Set to Yes to immediately redirect your customer back to you shop after the payment completed.

column1: Add payment fee to the shipping and handling amount:
column2: Add payment fee to the shipping and handling amount:

column1: If the customer pays for the payment fee the amount will not be displayed on the order confirmation. However it is possible to add the amount to the shipping and handling amount displayed at the bottom of the order confirmation.
column2: If the customer pays for the payment fee the amount will not be displayed on the order confirmation. However it is possible to add the amount to the shipping and handling amount displayed at the bottom of the order confirmation.

column1: Enabling this setting will result in an order confirmation is e-mailed to the customer as the payment is made.
column2: Enabling this setting will result in an order confirmation is e-mailed to the customer as the payment is made.

column1: The order of which this payment method is displayed to the customer.
column2: The order of which this payment method is displayed to the customer.
